org.qcri.rheem.core.util

Class Optional<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.util.Optional<T>

  • public abstract class Optional<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility similar to Optional. However, it supports null as a valid value.
